meanings.definition: A bed filled with feathers for comfort.
meanings.sent1: The luxurious featherbeds in the hotel made me feel like I was sleeping on a cloud.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new featherbed for her guest room to ensure her visitors had a cozy stay.
meanings.sent3: After a long day at work, sinking into my featherbed felt like a warm hug.
meanings.sent4: The featherbed enveloped me in softness, easing all my worries away.
meanings.sent5: The gentle embrace of the featherbed lulled me into a peaceful slumber.

meanings.definition: To pamper or spoil someone excessively.
meanings.sent1: She featherbeds her pet dog, giving him treats and belly rubs all day long.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy heiress loved to featherbed her grandchildren with extravagant gifts.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly accused his friend of featherbedding him with too much attention.
meanings.sent4: The coach featherbeds his star player, always giving him special treatment.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity was featherbedded by her entourage, catering to her every whim.
